entry.title: Tuesday: Snow. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow and local blowing snow beginning near noon. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming east 30 km/h gusting to 50 this morning. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 31 this morning and minus 16 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Snow. Local blowing snow this evening. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light overnight. Low minus 10. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 28 February 2023
